title: Instructional Design Practical Competency Enhancement: Short-Term Science Inquiry Competency Strengthening Program Using PDA

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can efficiently collect and process data from three or more science experiments using PDAs
Learners can visualize experimental results and perform basic statistical analysis using PDA-based apps

Learners will share ≥3 sets of experimental data using collaboration tools (Google Docs, Padlet), provide specific feedback to ≥2 peers, and suggest improvement plans within 24 hours of receiving feedback.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
